Gui server module¶

Сontains files for user interface.

gui_main_window.py¶

class gui_server.gui_main_window.MainWindow(app, database)¶

Class main window for user. Contains contacts list, text edit and history messages

make_connection_signals(transport_server_obj)¶

Signal connection method.

update_connected_users_slot()¶

Slot update connected users list on main window

gui_registration_user.py¶

class gui_server.gui_registration_user.RegistrationDialog(database)¶

Window for registration user. Required fields - login, password, confirm password. Save hash password.

gui_settings_window.py¶

class gui_server.gui_settings_window.SettingsWindow¶

Window settings. Save settings in file .ini
